entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Optimize "x == a && y == b" #104767
  • ILCompiler.Compiler.Tests.SwiftLoweringTests.VerifyLowering failing with preivew 6 #104765
  • HttpClient sents full request during NTLM NEGOTIATE #104745
    Future
  • ILLink analyzer: implement warnings for DAM on type #104742
  • ILC: missing warning for DAM on type when used through derived type #104740
  • HTTP Metrics & Tracing: provide a way to Opt-In `url.scheme` #104738
    10.0.0
  • [browser][WBT] SignalRPassMessageWasmBrowser - NU1903 - System.Text.Json 8.0.0 #104737
    9.0.0
  • SettingsProperty constructor ignores serializeAs parameter if it is not SettingsSerializeAs.Binary #104732
  • Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.ProduceDiagnosticFromOtherAssemblyTest failed in CI #104723
    Future
  • HttpClient.Send not supported in MAUI running on Android or iOS causing PlatformNotSupportedException #104716
    Future
  • System.Linq.Expressions: Expression.Variable in lambda called from loop not correctly re-initialised on each loop iteration #104715
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 1 Regression in System.Tests.Perf_Int128 #104739
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on linux-musl-arm #104710
  • [android] Connection issues in Sockets and Functional networking tests #104709
  • Issue with Azerbaijani Culture in .NET 8 Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App #104717
    9.0.0

Closed

  • CILJit::compileMethod :: Slow processing #103751
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Trim analyzer doesn't report AOT warnings caused by reflection access to annotated methods within compiler generated methods #101998
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 4/11/2024 11:29:08 PM #101134
  • UnhandledExceptionEventHandler in MemoryCache can cause a deadlock. #64115
    8.0.0
  • Building runtime on ARM64 uses x86 tools? #96141
    9.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer: redundant warnings for annotation mismatch on DIM #104746
  • Indirect dependency on vulnerable System.Text.Json 8.0.0 through Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json #104705
  • Plans for opt-in OpenTelemetry attribute implementation and configuration? #103302
    9.0.0
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104185
    9.0.0
  • FileSystemWatcher_InternalBufferSize_SynchronizingObject test failed in CI #103495
  • [browser][ST] Wasm tests timeout #103246
    9.0.0
  • Occasional crashes in System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Alpine 3.15 #85666
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.RentAndReturnManyOfTheSameSize_NoneAreSame #103943
    9.0.0
  • Expose Json in SqlDbType #103925
    9.0.0
  • QUESTION: NullReferenceException message details #104703
  • System.Text.Json 8.0.4 - No Authorization Manager set. #104719
  • Property 'JsonPropertyInfo.DeclaringType' has 'internal' access modifier #104706
  • [Linker][Tests] HttpClientTests fails with System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: The SSL connection could not be established #104682
    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamNetworkStreamTest.SslStream_RandomSizeWrites_OK #104605
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationRoot GetValue behavior changed #103353

PullRequests

Created

  • Some more cleanup to regex NonBacktracking #104766
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Uncomment disabled test that has been fixed #104764
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Second attempt at fixing ARM64 cross compilation #104763
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix ISOSDACInterface::GetThreadData reading the GC alloc context. #104762
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix issue link for an expected difference in warning behavior #104760
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • cDac work necessary to get the MethodTableName #104759
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Qualify the well-known IntPtr SpecialTypeInfo instance #104758
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Don't warn for reflection access to compiler-generated code #104757
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104756
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104755
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104754
    NO-MERGE, os-linux, area-Setup, 9.0.0
  • Fix trim warnings for base method implementing interface #104753
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump the stj version to avoid error #104751
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix zlib-ng build failure caught in the sdk CI #104750
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable embedding install location options in apphost #104749
    area-Host
  • HTTP Metrics: Uncoditionally report server.port #104741
    area-System.Net.Http, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters: fix target framework check for source-build. #104735
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Testing OOM in System.Buffers.Tests #104734
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_AL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not ignore `MemoryMarshal.TryWrite` result in `Guid` #104728
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete FEATURE_READYTORUN_COMPILER ifdef #104727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Improve SslStream PAL buffer resizing #104726
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [NO REVIEW] Check if first prefix is HTTP/2.0 or HTTP/1.1 in WinHttp #104722
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Add Sve.ScatterXBitYNarrowing() on Arm64 #104720
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Don't make web requests in HttpClient trimming test #104718
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0] Disable SslStress and HttpStress runs #104714
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • [HTTP/2] Throw meaningful exception if we get GOAWAY while reading response body #104707
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation

Merged

  • Condition DurationHistogram_HasBucketSizeHints on RemoteExecutor #104736
    area-System.Net
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Provide fix for #81093 - "Mono does not emit ProcessExit event on SIGTERM" #100056
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Don't dispose timers if we're in our UnhandledException handler. #103937
    area-System.Runtime.Caching, 9.0.0
  • [ICorProfiler] Add new API to enumerate GC Heap objects #103735
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [WASI] use 64bit WASI SDK on windows #104733
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] back to WASI_SDK_PATH and detection improvement #104729
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Increase helix timeout for superpmi-diffs job #104725
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add NET 8.0 target to Microsoft.Bcl.Memory package #104648
    area-System.Buffers
  • [release/8.0] Use latest .NET version in HttpStress runs #104711
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Use latest released SDK for HttpStress. #104713
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use ARM64 tools when building on ARM64 hosts #104695
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Enhancing the SqlDbType with Json #103985
    area-System.Data
  • Fix frame boundary detection in SslStream #104606
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix various asserts that were found by Antigen #104625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do more DSA parameter sanity checking up front #104646
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Activities for Http Connections, Dns, Sockets and SslStream #103922
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to preview 6 #104696
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2493189 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricMultiplyAddCoefficient` #104697
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fix PHI non-null pattern #104493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Refine post-dominance check in strength reduction #104687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Throw InvalidOperationException on RuntimeMethodHandle.GetFunctionPointer() for generic methods #104644
    area-System.Reflection, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Straighten out flow during early jump threading #104603
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, look for RhpThrowHwEx2 as well. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Ensure mono wasm jiterpreter handles v128_bitcast #104698
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Skip exact interface matches when an interface has variance #103757
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • [Wasi] switch to preview 2 #104683
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] Link native shared libraries with 16k page alignment #104577
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • ILLink: Fix order dependent logic for DAM on types #104701
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Decompose some bitwise operations in HIR to allow more overall optimizations to kick in #104517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `AddSequentialAcross` #104640
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [Mono] [swift-interop] Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `TrigonometricSelectCoefficient`, `TrigonometricStartingValue` #104681
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `FloatingPointExponentialAccelerator` #104649
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Disable code formatting in code we want to keep as is #95986
    area-Meta
  • Expose `JsonElement.DeepEquals` #104579
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Optimize BigInteger.ToString for large decimal string #104676
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Replace Ubuntu 18 images with Ubuntu 20 in ARM 64 runs #104689
    area-System.Net.Security
  • JIT: Prove some cases where strength reducing to GC pointers is ok #104679
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104662
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Copy prop equivalent phis #104458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • [Apple-Mobile][Globalization] Refactoring of CalendarData.iOS and new DateTimeFormatInfo* tests #102464
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • SPMI: Fix a few memory leaks #104691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext tests #104686
    needs-area-label
  • Add DivRem with DivisionRounding (WIP + Review request) #104589
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use `GetArrayDataReference` in `Vector*` #104532
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
